name: 2024 Planning Template
description: Free notion template to help you plan your vision for 2024, set goals and get closer to achieving them.What's included:Create your visionCalculate your dream lifeTime auditGoal TrackingCreating systems to bring your goals to lifeHow to use this template:Who am I?I'm Anna, a web designer and content creator. After making over $100k online, these are the methods I use to get clear on my goals and plan my time for maximum clarity, productivity and most importantly - enjoyment.FAQsHow does this work
features: Create your vision; Calculate your dream life; Goal Tracking; Creating systems to bring your goals to life

enhancedContent.overview: The 2024 Planning Template is a comprehensive year-planning system created by a successful online entrepreneur who has used these exact methods to build a six-figure income. This template goes beyond simple goal-setting to help you create a complete vision for your year, calculate what your dream life actually costs, and build practical systems to achieve it. The template combines vision work with tactical execution, including a time audit feature that reveals where you're actually spending your hours versus where you want to spend them. Created by Anna, a web designer and content creator, this template reflects the real-world planning methods that produce results, not just aspirational goal-setting that never gets executed.

features: Guided vision-building exercises for the year ahead
Dream life calculator to determine financial targets
Clarity-focused prompts for defining what you truly want
Time audit tool to analyze current time usage
Identify time leaks and misalignments with priorities
Optimize schedule for maximum productivity and enjoyment
Structured goal-setting framework with measurable targets
Progress tracking systems to monitor achievement
Regular review prompts to stay on track
Create systems and routines that support your goals
Transform goals into daily habits and actions
Practical implementation strategies from real-world success

problemsSolved: Setting ambitious goals that never translate into actual progress because there's no practical implementation plan
Not knowing what your dream life actually costs, making it impossible to set realistic financial targets
Time slipping away on low-priority activities while important goals get neglected
solutionsBenefits: Provides a dream life calculator that turns abstract aspirations into concrete financial targets you can work toward
Includes time audit tools that reveal the gap between how you spend time and how you should spend it to reach goals
Creates systems and routines that transform goals from wishful thinking into daily actions backed by real-world success methods
idealFor: Entrepreneurs and freelancers planning business growth and income targets for the year
Goal-oriented individuals who want strategic planning backed by proven success principles
Anyone who has set goals before but struggled with execution and follow-through
People seeking clarity on what they truly want and what it will take to achieve it
Users who value practical systems over motivational fluff in their planning tools
notRecommendedFor: People who prefer spontaneous, unstructured approaches to life and work
Users looking for weekly or monthly planning rather than annual strategic planning

faqs.question: How do I get started with this template?
faqs.answer: After duplicating the template to your workspace, begin with the vision creation section. Work through the dream life calculator to understand your financial targets, then complete the time audit to see where your hours currently go. Finally, set goals and create systems that bridge the gap between your current state and dream life.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The template includes a vision creation framework, dream life calculator for financial goal-setting, comprehensive time audit tools, goal tracking systems with progress monitoring, and practical guides for creating systems that bring goals to life. All methods are based on strategies the creator used to generate over $100k online.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Adapt the vision prompts to your specific life areas, customize the dream life calculator categories to match your priorities, modify the time audit to track your unique schedule, and adjust goal frameworks to align with your planning style. The core methodology remains while you personalize the implementation.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases?
faqs.answer: Use it for strategic annual planning with realistic financial targets, identifying and eliminating time-wasting activities through audits, creating actionable systems that turn goals into daily habits, aligning your schedule with your actual priorities for more enjoyment and productivity, and building a roadmap from where you are to where you want to be.
